headache.recommendation: Try brewing fresh feverfew tea or peppermint tea. Lavender essential oil applied to temples may also help reduce tension. Stay hydrated and rest in a quiet, dark room.

anxiety.recommendation: Chamomile tea can help calm nerves. Passionflower and lemon balm are also known for their calming properties. Try these herbs as a tea before bedtime.

common_cold.recommendation: Echinacea can boost immune function. Elder berry and ginger tea with honey can help soothe symptoms. Add a slice of lemon for vitamin C.

digestive_issues.recommendation: Peppermint tea aids digestion. Ginger can help with nausea. Fennel seeds can reduce bloating. Try these individually or make a digestive tea blend.

insomnia.recommendation: Valerian root is known to improve sleep. Combine with chamomile and lavender tea before bedtime. Avoid screens for an hour before sleep.

stress.recommendation: Holy basil (Tulsi) is an adaptogenic herb that helps manage stress. Ashwagandha and Rhodiola can also help balance stress responses.
